menus.name: Ham & Cheese Croissant
menus.description: Ham, Swiss cheese, lettuce, tomato and a butter spread on a croissant.

menus.name: Smoked Salmon Croissant
menus.description: Smoked salmon, lettuce, tomato and lemon spread on a croissant.

menus.name: Ham, Egg & Swiss Cheese Croissant
menus.description: Ham, scrambled egg and Swiss cheese on a croissant.

menus.name: Sandwich Dieppois
menus.description: A generous filling of tuna mayonnaise with tomato, cucumber and lettuce in a freshly made bread.

menus.name: Ham, Egg & Cheese Baguette
menus.description: Ham, scrambled egg and Swiss cheese on a baguettine.

menus.name: Sandwich Montagnard
menus.description: Dry-cured Coppa ham, Comté cheese, tomatoes, olive tapenade and salad leaves in a freshly baked poppy seed bread.

menus.name: Half Flute, Butter & Jam
menus.description: Half Baguette served with butter and Jam

menus.name: Quiche Lorraine
menus.description: Paris ham, bacon, Swiss cheese & egg filling in a puff pastry shell, served with a garden salad.

menus.name: Croissant
menus.description: Croissant – rich and tasty with a crisp crust and a deliciously soft centre.

menus.name: Chocolate Croissant x 4
menus.description: Our Pain au Chocolat is a best seller for a reason, made with pure butter and a heart of rich, dark chocolate.

menus.name: Escargot Raisins x 4
menus.description: These delicious pastries are made with a rich buttery dough filled with vanilla custard and plump raisins.

menus.name: Lemon Tartlet Duo
menus.description: A pair of individual tartlets – crisp shortcrust pastry filled with a refreshing lemon cream.

menus.name: Tartelette Fine Aux Pommes
menus.description: This new Apple Tartlet makes a great light dessert, as it has no pastry cream.

menus.name: 4 Strawberry Tartlets
menus.description: Crisp, sweet shortcrust pastry filled with a smooth vanilla custard cream and topped with fresh strawberries.

menus.name: Elephant Ear
menus.description: A crisp, butter puff pastry biscuit. The puff pastry is rolled up with sugar, sliced and baked so that the sugar caramelises.

menus.name: Mini Chocolat Beignet
menus.description: A delicious soft mini doughnut with a chocolate hazelnut filling.

menus.name: Chocolate Éclair
menus.description: Chocolate hazelnut, red fruit, apple.

menus.name: Croissant Box (10)
menus.description: 10 Fresh Baked Croissants to Share.

menus.name: Mini Beignets Box (30)
menus.description: A Mix of Sugar Donuts and Chocolate Hazelnut Donuts.

menus.name: Cafe Au Lait
menus.description: Coffee, hot milk.

menus.name: Macchiato
menus.description: Espresso topped with froth.

menus.name: Americano
menus.description: Espresso, hot water.

menus.name: Cappuccino
menus.description: Espresso, hot milk, froth.

menus.name: Late
menus.description: Espresso, hot milk.

menus.name: Mochaccino
